entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming west 60 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
